qas.question: What Christian beliefs did Emperor Valens adhere to?
Where did Athanasius during his latest exile?
For how long was he exiled this time?
Where did he hide during this time?
Who convinced Valens to let him return to Alexandria?
What Catholic beliefs did Emperor Valens adhere to?
Where did Athanasius go during his first exile?
How many years was he exiled?
Who didn't convince Valens to let him return to Alexandria?

context: Two years later, the Emperor Valens, who favored the <a0_0><b5_0>Arian<b5_0/><a0_0/> position, in his turn exiled Athanasius. This time however, Athanasius simply left for the <a1_0><b6_0>outskirts of Alexandria<b6_0/><a1_0/>, where he stayed for only a <a2_0><b7_0>few months<b7_0/><a2_0/> before the <a4_0><b8_0>local authorities<b8_0/><a4_0/> convinced Valens to retract his order of exile. Some early reports state that Athanasius spent this period of exile at his family's ancestral tomb in a Christian cemetery. It was during this period, the final exile, that he is said to have spent four months in hiding in <a3_0>his father's tomb<a3_0/>. (Soz., "Hist. Eccl.", VI, xii; Soc., "Hist. Eccl.", IV, xii).
